statusSingleplayer.name: Display type
statusSingleplayer.description:
Change how the display advancements.

Hidden: Don't show any advancements
Default: Only minecraft toast message
Chat: Only show advancements gained in chat
Both: Use both 'Chat' and 'Default' as display type

statusMultiplayer.name: Display type
statusMultiplayer.description:
Change how the display advancements.

Hidden: Don't show any advancements
Default: Only minecraft toast message
Chat: Only show advancements gained in chat
Both: Use both 'Chat' and 'Default' as display type

messageSingleplayer.name: Chat message
messageSingleplayer.description:
The message sent in chat when display type is set to 'Chat' or 'Both'.

-> %%name%% will be replaced with the advancement name.

messageMultiplayer.name: Chat message
messageMultiplayer.description:
The message sent in chat when display type is set to 'Chat' or 'Both'.

-> %%name%% will be replaced with the advancement name.

showDescriptionSingleplayer.name: Show description
showDescriptionSingleplayer.description: The chat message will display the description of the advancement as a hover message.

showDescriptionMultiplayer.name: Show description
showDescriptionMultiplayer.description: The chat message will display the description of the advancement as a hover message.

descriptionTextSingleplayer.name: Description
descriptionTextSingleplayer.description:
The layout of the description message.

-> %%description%% will be replaced with the advancement description.

descriptionTextMultiplayer.name: Description
descriptionTextMultiplayer.description:
The layout of the description message.

-> %%description%% will be replaced with the advancement description.
